desc.en: Shanghai Yan'an Road Medium-capacity Transit, a.k.a. Route 71 system, is a medium-capacity bus system in Shanghai, running 7 bus lines including 1 main line (Route 71), 1 interval (Route 71 interval), 3 branch (1250, 1251, 748) and 1 shuttle (Route 71 - SHA T2 shuttle). The bus system owns specific bus lanes and platforms in the middle of roads.

updateHistory.reason: New template of Shanghai Yan-an Rd. Medium-capacity Transit
